website_summaries.verdict: This attractive, well-made changing table made our list because of details like a secure front panel and rounded corners to protect babies.
pros: A sturdy changing table with classic looks, ample storage space, a comfortable pad, and modern safety features
Made in Canada with eco-friendly wood
cons: We found that South Shore Angel Changing Table is somewhat difficult to assemble, and requires a variety of tools

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Us
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. We have used for over 6 months and everything is fine. So grateful that there is nice looking and durable furniture at a decent price. Also glad I didn't spend $400 on a crib at the Baby's R Us. I ended up with an entire collection for my daughter's room for less than $700 - I purchased the South Shore crib, changing table and drawer chest and they are all great quality and had no issues putting together. Very good decision.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce_imb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: First of all this thing weighs at least 80 pounds when it arrives. There way for me to get it up stairs other than 1 piece at a time. It arrived damaged, but we kept going anyways. Assembly....... I have built a fair amount of furniture, I have NEVER had so much trouble assembling something so basic. The directions are not entirely correct either. The drawers.... for as much as this things weighs you would thing the drawer bottoms would be more than what appears to be extra thick cardboard. The drawer pulls...why is the screw like 3.5” long and nearly impossible to completely tighten? I don’t imagine this piece lasting 6 months. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Painted rose

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this changing table. We recently gave it away, after 18 months of use and it was still in excellent condition. We planned on using this even after as a dresser but were given a larger dresser that worked better otherwise I would have kept this. Putting it together was a pain in the butt but it looked good and served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Literally falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: We were shipped incorrect pieces, two of one side panel, none of the other. We contacted the manufacturer and they shipped a replacement. Assembly was more difficult than necessary. The tolerance on the various pieces is absolutely terrible. None of the edges are close to flush with each other, leaving huge gaps after assembly, especially in the drawers. After less than four months of use, the drawers started falling apart. We've kept nothing in them except baby clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Too dark
customer_reviews.text: Be careful about the seller and make sure you are getting what you want ,had a huge problem returning.It was almost pitch BLACK
customer_reviews.author: sidee

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking without a big price tag
customer_reviews.text: I chose this changing table because I think it will transition well as my daughter grows up. It's time-consuming to put together, but I was also about eight months pregnant when I did it. It's very nice looking once it's put together. I struggled a bit getting the drawers slid into place alone, but did just fine with my husband's help. Be very careful how you slide around the boards because they scratch pretty easily. A marker is included for touch-ups, and you can't tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Fancher

customer_reviews.title: Nice, affordable and stable
customer_reviews.text: I am currently 8 months pregnant and ordered this changing table because we were looking for one that that drawers. This is one of the very few that has them - which kinda surprises me. My husband who has been putting together baby gear for 6 months now says that this was one of the hardest things to put together. It has many pieces and it does take a while to put together. At first I was concerned with it not being stable enough, but it turns out that it is. We have it all nicely set in our nursery waiting for our boy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Great Changing Table! Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order a changing table sight unseen, but after reading the reviews and looking at VERY expensive changing tables that were similar, I decided to go for it. I haven't regreted my purchase once. It is functional, nice looking and not something that I am going to worry about getting rid of when we are done having babies due to the cheap price. I bought 3 baskets for mine. One is for socks, one is for lotions, powders, etc. and one is for diapers. The drawers a large enough to fit all my blankets and some clothes that I chose to not hang up. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Great, but beware the assembly process!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, be sure that you and your partner are ready to calmly and maturely work together before attempting to assemble this together. They should put a warning label on this: may cause marital distress. Wine helpful. Other than that, it's a great little changing table for the price, and we've been using it happily for 7 months. Do yourself a favor and replace the drawer pulls with some cuter ones, though!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this based on others reviews, but I am glad I bought it. No, it's not the highest of quality...but once put together it was very sturdy and I have no reservations about putting our newborn on it. I tried putting it together myself (while my husband was busy with other things), but ended up needed a little extra muscles for help. I was so pleased that no pieces were missing, which tends to be a theme with assemble-yourself items. Overall I was very happy with the product. Nothing somthing our kid will grow up using...but serves its purpose for a changing table.
customer_reviews.author: LuvShping

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, All the parts were well marked and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, All the parts were well marked and easy to put together. This item even came with a touch up marker for any scratches or dings, to keep your table looking new. There were two extra pieces in the box, that were of a different color wood (cherry color), that had no part numbers on them, which was a little confusing, but we realized they were just spacers in the box to keep the other pieces from shifting. This is a beautiful piece, got it for my grandson, and we all love it..
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Duron

customer_reviews.title: Going on year 5 and baby #3 with this table
customer_reviews.text: This is year 5 and baby number 3 using this changing table. After the 2 Nd year and one move it did break a little, but it’s still usable and no one can see the part that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this piece in person, the color is nice and I think it was a good deal for the price. However, I have two complaints with it. First, the directions had no words, just pictures. My husband is very handy and it took him about 6 hours to put it together because the directions were so confusing. And it arrived in a hundred small pieces. My only other complaint is that the drawers are not very deep or tall once opened. The facade is far bigger than the actual drawers. We will definitely need more storage. But it looks nice, and was a good price so...?
customer_reviews.author: Trenton P. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for my granddaughter for the past 8 months. It is darker than the picture, which is a good thing, because it blends in with her black furniture. The drawers are easy to open and sturdy. Just remember, when the baby starts crawling and using furniture to stand up... push items to the back when you're using the open shelf. Or use it for baby toys... or you'll have diapers and wipes all over the floor. Yikes!
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sturdy changing table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy changing table. Good size and nice finish on the materials. If you put it together properly and snug all fasteners you shouldn't have any worries. 4 stars because the drawers don't glide on any sort or rail system. They just fit inside. So they don't feel secure when opening or closing. But for the price I guess I'm okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sibilio

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth!
customer_reviews.text: Took a week and a half to arrive at my doorstep. When it did arrive, it was realllly heavy. Took hubby 3 hours to put together. Wood is sturdy and nice material, but it is painted a cherry color instead if stained. Doesnt look as nice as our babi italia furniture set. Wouldnt pay $180. Glad i got it on sale for $112. Overall nice sturdy construction and great changing station for cloth diapers! I am pleased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing table. It has all the storage that you will every need for diapers and wipes. This changing table was really easy to put together. The instructions were clear and easy to understand. I put some baskets in the opening to store all the baby wash and the extra stuff that accumulate with having a child. My child is now 18 months, her feet hang off the end (she doesn't mind) and I still use this changing table. I would recommend this to anyone that is expecting a baby or looking to replace an old changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in early 2010. One of the pieces arrived broken but we were sent a new one within a week. It is a little difficult to put together but not really any more difficult than the crib. The color does look a little darker in person. We have been using it for 3 years now and it has held up well. It's solid. My son fit on it pretty well up until he was 2 or so. He is now 3 and his legs dangle off but we've still been using it. I think it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: I like this product and will continue to use it for ...
customer_reviews.text: The base of the drawers keep coming off. Also the edges of the changing station are a bit sharp and would hurt the baby when they are active and throwing their hands and feet arnd. I stuck one of the edge protectors you get for baby proofing the house all around it. Aside from this, I like this product and will continue to use it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chadha

customer_reviews.title: Assembly isn't easy but it's a beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to assemble, but it is sturdy and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy! My son loves to roll and roll when you are changing him or after his bath. And the South Shore changing table doesn't wobble. My husband put it together in no time at all. I looks great. The drawers are solid. There were some scraps on the pieces when coming out of the box, but the pen provided covered them up very well, or they were hidden after construction. I would recommend this to anyone. We had to replace a hand me down, and we made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality, wrong color, overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a much lighter "Royal Cherry" color than it depicts. This changer is actually pretty dark, almost an "Espresso" color. Built quality is sub-par. All particle board and most screws strip the wood during build. Front to pieces that cover the front are screwed on. Unnecessary... should have already been permanently mounted to it. Most of the pieces in the box were already scratched and the top molding looked like it had been glued back together. Save your money and buy a better quality changer for a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Packed as damaged goods, not damaged during shipment. rear-top vertical board gouged and chipped. side board gouged and chipped. Particle board covered with thin laminate, quality could be better. QC inspection apparently non-existent, damaged goods packed probably to make end of month shipments. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: NoCrap

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult - but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It IS a little hard to put together (FYI - Reading ahead on the directions will help you determine which end is up when in doubt) but the end result is awesome. Looks SO good in the room. Super sturdy. It did come with a few tiny nicks and scratches from shipping but I loved that they included a touch up pen for exactly that reason!
customer_reviews.author: KerriSC

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY, yes it looks nice. and seems to be built in the least: "Walmart Sturdy". But once you actually start putting things in the drawers they either bust on the sides or the bottom falls out. Might as well change your baby on a regular table because thats all this is good for. NOT STORAGE, NOT EVEN STRONG ENOUGH TO HOLD BABY CLOTHES. WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Sturdy piece. Drawers have plenty of room. I was able to put wide baskets on the first level but nothing too tall. The color is darker in person (see matching dresser listing for a better idea). It was also a little more complicated to assemble than the dresser. The directions are some of the worst we have seen. Overall, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A.Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: but holds our 1 year old fine. Just another example of
customer_reviews.text: We were missing more than half of the #99 Screws so we had to halt construction and drive to Lowes to find a similar replacement. Don't expect this to last through our move coming up either, it's wobbly, but holds our 1 year old fine. Just another example of, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: TrinityWolf

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid quality piece of furniture (it's 70lbs). Nd it's as solid as wood. We bought to go along with our nursery furniture set that we bought from a quality store, and this piece was an add on when my second daughter was born. The color is more espresso than a dark cherry. Took some time to assemble, but looks great. Only issue was the screws for the knobs seemed a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Teece Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Think it could be cheaper, but I bought it for my bestie who is expecting and she says she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but missing the back panel...
customer_reviews.text: This chaning table was easy to assemble and looks nice, however, I was disappointed that the box was missing the back panel. I had to go to Home Depot and purchase a piece of hard board to attach to the back. It was an extra trip and extra $$ I didn't need or want to spend. I called the manufacturer after I purchased the hard board and put it on the back, and they said that they would have sent me the missing piece. So FYI to anyone that may end up missing a part...call the manufacturer ASAP. The manufacturer refused to reimburse me for the extra $$ I paid for the materials.
customer_reviews.author: HedgieMom603

customer_reviews.title: Nice Furniture, Bad Shipping
customer_reviews.text: It was really entertaining to watch my husband put this piece of furniture together. Not as entertaining to discover 2 broken pieces when we opened it up, and then having to wait until THE DAY BEFORE THE BABY WAS BORN to get the pieces in the mail and be able to finish putting the thing together. But it really ties the nursery together, and it's so handy! I'm curious to see what we'll be able to use it for after she's potty trained, though...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rupe

customer_reviews.title: This looks beautiful and wasn't too hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful and wasn't too hard to put together. The only downside, is the color is closer to black than dark brown, other than that, we love it! We put 3 baskets on the shelf and it looks amazing and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, save your money
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, have been using for less than a year, bottom drawer already not staying in the "tracks" which are cheaply made pieces of plastic. And there is nothing heaving in it - diapers. Overall disappointed by the cost and quality. Not recommended. Only positive is that it looks pretty if you don't look too closely and realize how cheap it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: South Shore Changing Table
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with one of the edges broken. This product comes with many parts. This product is only for people that are very handy with their hands as there there are many parts inclucded and please do not lose any parts as you are only provided exactly what is needed to make the product. It took me six plus hours to complete this product. Please do not buy this product unless you are very handy with tools and are very patient. For the price i would have gone to a consignment store and bought an already constructed product for much less money. I hope these comments help anyone that is thinking of buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: mvale

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and arrived in perfect condition. My husband had this put together in an hour. The drawers are deep, the finish is beautiful and it's very sturdy! I would buy this again any day! I am 5'6 and the changing tables height fits me perfectly for changing our little one.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernMomma

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Ours had a big chunk out of the wood when we got it but I built it before finding out. The item itself is great and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with this product. I have had it for 6 months and the drawers are falling apart constantly. The base of the drawer is not holding much weight from baby clothes and just keeps collapsing. It is very frustrating I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Donato

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product came with multiple damages parts. No words, really. Hopefully we will get our refund soon so we can just go buy a changing table dresser that isn't damaged. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Holloway

customer_reviews.title: I had to use super glue and duct tape just to finish assembly
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived scratched and with defective parts. Of course the smaller drawer which was the last oartto be assembled was not manufactured correctly. I was not going to disassemble the entire piece when I only had the drawer left. I had to use super glue and duct tape just to finish assembly. This was very disappointing and I’m requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley E. Lapomardo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: its only 4 months since we started using it and parts started to come off, i. e. drawers
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality furniture! I have two pieces of furniture from this manufacturer and 4 out of the 6 drawers have broken. Buy IKEA, is cheaper and lasts for ever UPDATE: it broke again and South Shore only says that they will continue sending me parts but won't take the changing table back. REally bad service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This changing table looks great once it is finished but it was difficult to assemble. I'm about to be a single mom and all I will say is thank God for my dad and his patience putting this together. The directions were great and the parts weren't clearly marked so that made the assembley difficult. Once the changing table was but together though it looked great in the nursery and seems to be holding up well. I have it fully loaded with all changing necessities and it seems sturdy so far. This piece was significantly cheaper than many other changing table I looked at but doesn't look cheap once it is put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Entzel

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: The changing table fits perfectly n the nusery. The Cherrywood color is true to color. The drawers in the changing table lets u have a place for clothes, towels, sheets. There is also an open area where i put diapers. Well worth the cost. Not too hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Toni diggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put together but looks great once it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Hudson jr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, beautiful price!
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic in our nursery! There were no marks on the wood from shipping, it was easy to set up, and it looks like we paid $300+ for it! Happy, Happy customers!
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and found that this piece of furniture is all fiberboard. Other than that, it's a great little changing table for the price, the only problem was when it got couple drops of water the drawer got ruined. Keep all water away from this furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jurgita

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The material is kind of cheap particle board. Some of the corners were chipped but luckily they were in the back of the table. I had to put some tape on the top corners as they are SUPER sharp for some reason too! It went together pretty well but we weren't completely satisfied with the cheap material used
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: My husband built it pretty quickly. I was hesitant to purchase because of ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband built it pretty quickly. I was hesitant to purchase because of other reviews but it was great and looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: R.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Looks great. Was pretty easy to get together as long as you were organized with parts. Only slight problem we had was with drawers hole alignment was were able to adapt and not if fine. Look wonderful very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: The finished product is BEAUTIFUL! However putting it together was not an easy ...
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is BEAUTIFUL! However putting it together was not an easy task. My brother put it together for me and took nearly three hours but it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: You've got your work cut out for you
customer_reviews.text: Looks okay once assembled, but assembly is a pain and the unit is not as sturdy as I hoped. The worst part is that I ordered it in espresso but the color is much closer to black. Had I known the color would be off and it would take hours to assemble a less-than-sturdy unit, I would have gladly paid more for something higher quality that requires much less work.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Looks And Functions Great
customer_reviews.text: This changing table setup looks great in the kids room, and it functions just as well. The drawers slide easily and if you have the gumption you can assemble it by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only been using it for 6weeks but so far it is great. Sturdy and it holds everything i need it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jolisa

customer_reviews.title: I love this dresser
customer_reviews.text: I love this dresser! I bought it for my newborn. It was easy to assemble and is very functional in the nursery. I bought small fabrics bins for the shelf for diapers, etc. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hedtke

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to put together, but worth it, I think. You definitely get what you pay for. It's made of particle board and has a cheap finish on it, but surprisingly, it looks good with my other rather expensive nursery furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Boy's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Nice changing table, look sturdy too (haven't used it yet, since baby is still inside). Took effort to put together, but it's still ok. Just have to read the manual (compared to IKEA stuffs, that very logical and easy to put together). Major bummer: the smell is awful! Specially inside the drawers, let the drawers kept open for 2 weeks and still smelly, hope the smell will go away before baby is there (already tried to wipe it several times with water, organic cleansing spray).
customer_reviews.author: Buncis

customer_reviews.title: Traditional cherry changing table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice changing table in a true cherry finish. Perfect for woodlands nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review item as soon as it arrives
customer_reviews.text: The item was received with the box damaged. When we opened the box, sure enough the item was scratched. When we were putting the item togother there were additional pieces that were stracthed. I would not purchased such item again through this website.
customer_reviews.author: SandraC

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice from a distance
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice from a distance. It’s a complete pain to put together and smells like formaldehyde for weeks. Also, the entire thing had knicks, scrapes, and chunks missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest thing to set up, the directions could be more clear... but once you get through the frustration its worth it. Looks great in the nursery and the shelves and drawers are very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thorell

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, wish it was better made.
customer_reviews.text: Very time consuming to assemble. My husband owns a construction company and it even took him a while to put it together. We also thought it would have been made with real wood. The drawers will not hold anything heavier than blankets. We also received wrong parts and had to wait another 10 days to receive the correct ones. The customer service department was easy to work with. When its fully assembeled, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina D. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome changing station!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little time consuming to put together, but well worth it! I used an added touch just to make sure it would last a very long time, and that was gluing certain parts together to ensure that. Love the color and matches the room perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in a box that was barely held together and was missing hardware needed to assemble the drawers. It was dinged and scratched on some of the pieces. They must anticipate that because a coloring pen was provided to cover the scratches. Overall, it's ok for the price that I paid, but its not a quality piece that will last past toddlerhood. It also took my mom and I 4 hours to assemble and it does take two people to move/assemble. Bottom line, I wouldn't purchase it again. Next time ill go to ikea....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Particle board shows its cracks....
customer_reviews.text: We bought this changing table to match the South Shore Crib and Toddler Bed (which we love!), but the materials used to make the changing table are noticeably poor quality in comparison. The piece is made of MDF and just about all of the edges are rough and look "dinged" right out of the box. We're just going with it since it's a temporary piece of furniture, even if we use it for more than one child, but it's unfortunate that South Shore couldn't make a nice matching set.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne H Freyhof

customer_reviews.title: 100 pieces to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: If I can rate it as no star, I would love to do so. 1. It is too hard to assemble. It includes tons of pieces and you need to refer to pages of handbook to assemble. In addition, the package is missing 4 essential spikes. I threw the box away when I started to assemble because the box is too large. Otherwise, I would like to return it immediately. 2. This changing table is not made of wood but wood chips. It is very cheap product with low quality. I highly double how long it can sustain.
customer_reviews.author: manxue

customer_reviews.title: The drawers won't stay on tracks!
customer_reviews.text: I was terribly disappointed with this purchase! The drawers will not stay on the tracks. This was a complete waste of money! It belongs in a dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: hk

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Assembly takes time
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Firm and sturdy. Very heavy. Assembly is complicated and need lots of room to lay out everything on the floor. Make sure u wear a pair of knee pads coz u will be kneeling and squatting on the floor for at least 5 hours to put it together. But the menu is easy to follow and u cannot go wrong. Comes with a crayon for fine tuning. Cute.
customer_reviews.author: nypt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pieces to put together! My husband found it fun to do but took him 3hrs!! Super nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Weve jad this for over a year now and we love it! Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Eaves

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: First we were sent the wrong parts to put it together, then we realized that most of it was plastic, and cheap wood. It was very unsteady. Putting it mildly, we think it was a piece of junk. this was very disappointing since we loved what it looked like and the changing table itself was exactly what we wanted. Now we will be lucky if we get another table in time for the birth of our baby!!
customer_reviews.author: hairandmakeuplady

customer_reviews.title: looks good but hard to install
customer_reviews.text: looks good but hard to install. I paired this with South Shore Angel 4 Drawer Chest, Espresso. Both looks very nice but the Knob of Drawers doesn't fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Ankita Ahuja

customer_reviews.title: ... can't wait to use this with my bundle of joy! It did take my husband a little while ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to use this with my bundle of joy! It did take my husband a little while longer then expected to put together. But its still a great size and can use it as a future dresser for the little one on his way!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice when finished but tons of anchors and screws for ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice when finished but tons of anchors and screws for assembly hope to get a few years out of it but cheap made product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan O

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and good quality too. It looks like the picture. I have been having this changing table for almost 2 years and it is still in very good conditions .
customer_reviews.author: rosariomaldonado

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture for a good price. Took me 3.5h to assamble, but wasn't so bad. Thought it will be worse. I bought it because of size - fit perfect my baby's room.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part
customer_reviews.text: This was sort of a pain to put together-especially since it was missing a part and took two extra weeks to get it to me. The company was good about getting me the extra piece though. It's not made from the best material but for the money isn't not too bad. I love the look and I'm enjoying not having to bend over to change my babies diaper.
customer_reviews.author: momof5boys

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not too difficult. We used a drill for certain parts which helped. Sturdy once constructed, and looks great for the price. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drawers don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good product the drawers keep coming off of the rails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this changing table. Nice color, good quality, very heavy. A challenge to put together, but done within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: changing table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy does not look cheap and easy to assemble.looks good in the baby's room matches crib very nice.
customer_reviews.author: peggy shultz

customer_reviews.title: Why the mysterious space behind the drawers?
customer_reviews.text: Only after you assemble can you tell that both the drawers are not as deep as the depth of the table. There is almost 4.5 inches space between the end of the drawers and the back of the table. Wonder what the designers thought, we'd want to hide in there. I wud've very much liked the drawers to use the full depth of the table as can be seen from outside.
customer_reviews.author: Ayush

customer_reviews.title: This product is nice it got here on Time
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice it got here on Time . The only thing it didn't match my crib it was too dark. The only reason I'm giving them a 3 star is because it came a little broken from one of the sides but I fix it my self and color it .
customer_reviews.author: cindy mora

customer_reviews.title: ... many pieces - too difficult to put together with terrible instructions. Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: So many pieces - too difficult to put together with terrible instructions. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Zengel

customer_reviews.title: Major assembly!
customer_reviews.text: very nice tho very dificult to put together, as every little piece had to be assembled, ended up with 2 extra pieces with no instruction as to what to do with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this was a gift
customer_reviews.text: They were able to put it together easily and are very happy with it. As far as I know, they like it.It arrived promptly, the box is very heavy that it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Nada O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: ... but for a temporary piece of furniture it's very nice looking and great storage space
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting on baby's arrival but for a temporary piece of furniture it's very nice looking and great storage space.
customer_reviews.author: HPagesT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Color just right, easy to assemble. Right size. Everything for a baby to start out with. Nice size changing table
customer_reviews.author: Kecia LHendrix

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very pleased with the quality of the changing table for the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very pleased with the quality of the changing table for the price we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughters nursery. It is by far the most used piece of furniture for her first 7 weeks here. Definitely a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was a little difficult...
customer_reviews.text: I do love this changing table however it was fairly difficult to put together. The images in the instructions weren't labeled very clearly and we had to do a lot of interpreting as to what direction the piece should face and what went where with which piece of hardware. Definitely a two person job. But it is sturdy and I love the drawers and open shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Charissa C Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Attractive piece, came with scratches/dents
customer_reviews.text: I've contacted Amazon and their sending us a replacement, free of charge. To their credit, that process has been extremely easy. The side pieces are a thin particle board that seemed to flake easily. Not sure how well this will stand up to kiddo wear-and-tear, but I'm still optimistic because I love the drawers and open shelf. Actual piece feels sturdy and durable despite the flimsy veneer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this changing table
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing table. It was super easy to put together and is nice and sturdy. I would recommend this table to anyone who is looking for this style changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: other than that I love
customer_reviews.text: The first one I order came damaged, other than that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Puchi

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: very nice all in one dresser changing table. baby not due until may. very pretty. did not come with changing pad
customer_reviews.author: Leen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was solid, but the box was crumpled and there were several knicks and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our first baby and the size of this changing table is nice. One small issue is we thought that the drawers will be bigger but they are smaller. Took a lot of time to assemble but final product is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mathgrad

customer_reviews.title: The item came diffective so I’m not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: The item came diffective so I’m not happy at all.... the drawers fall off from the railing constantly...followed the instructions to the T.... smh
customer_reviews.author: Yaquelin Medina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it turned out. Very good quality. Looks like it's worth a lot more than what was paid for. The only reason I didn't give five stars was because it took a long time to build it.
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: changing table
customer_reviews.text: The product came much sooner than the quoted ETA, which was great. Under promise over deliver. The changing table came in mint condition. And the color and quality surpassed my expectations. I would have given it a 5 if it would have came with the changing pad. I am struggling finding one that fits inside the designated area like I want it to. Another successful transaction with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Little

customer_reviews.title: It'll do the trick, just not what expected.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, assembly of this piece is a lot more complicated than it has to be. There are plastic parts instead of metal ones for where the drawers pull in and out. The plywood is visible on nearly all interior surfaces. I'm just really disappointed with this product. It is standing and it is sturdy for now. Not wobbly like others have mentioned. I did, however, use more nails for the back panel than were provided with the hardware. It'll do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: AK1981

product_meta.title: South Shore 2-Drawer Changing Table with Open Storage, Espresso
product_meta.description:
This practical changing table allows you to change baby safely with its rounded features and secure front panel. It also offers an open compartment ideal for keeping essential items close at hand, and two drawers equiped with matching wooden handles. You will have everything you need for your little on within an arms reach.

5-year limited guarantee
All our products meets or exceeds North American safety standards and our packaging are tested and certified to reduce the risk of damage during shipment. There is a wall anchor kit included in the box to prevent tip-over incidents, thus ensuring your family's safety.. This item is shipped in 1 box, make sure to have a friend with you. Assembly is required by 2 adults and tools are not included. If you have questions regarding this product or need assistance do not hesitate to contact South Shore Furniture 7 days support. This product is made in North America with laminated particleboard. Changing pad and accessories not included.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This practical changing table offers total safety thanks to its rounded contours and front panel. It also has an open storage compartment ideal for keeping your essentials close at hand. Its two drawers fitted with attractive wood handles feature the "Smart Glide" system with integrated safety catch and soft-closing mechanism to prevent accidents. The changing table has been designed to match most espresso-finish cribs on the market today.
feature_bullets: NURSERY STORAGE: The convenient and practical piece of baby’s room furniture feature spacious drawers for clothes storage, and an easy to access open shelf for baby's products
CLASSIC, MODERN STYLE: With a neutral and versatile design and finish, this changing table will complement any nursery decor, from traditional to contemporary.
SAFE AND SECURE: Ideal from newborn up to 30lb, your baby will be safe and protected by the changing table’s modern safety features including rounded edges and a secure front panel.
ECO-FRIENDLY: Made in North America with non-toxic laminated particleboard, this piece of furniture meets or exceeds all North American safety standards.
5-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Shop with confidence knowing that we proudly stand behind this piece of furniture with a full 5-year limited warranty. Assembly is required.
